title: Battlefield 6
longDescription: Battlefield 6 brings the franchise back to its roots with massive multiplayer battles, realistic weapon mechanics, and immersive environments. Players can engage in large-scale warfare with destructible terrains and vehicles.
shortDescription: Massive battles with realistic gameplay and destructible environments.

title: Vampire: The Masquerade
longDescription: Dive into a dark world of vampires, politics, and supernatural powers. Explore your choices, build alliances, and manipulate the undead society while struggling with your own humanity.
shortDescription: Dark vampire RPG full of intrigue and supernatural powers.

title: Arc Raiders
longDescription: Arc Raiders is a co-op action RPG where players battle alien creatures across different dimensions. Gather rare resources, upgrade your gear, and team up with friends to survive high-intensity missions.
shortDescription: Co-op action RPG with alien battles and gear upgrades.

title: Cyberpunk Rebellion
longDescription: Step into a neon-lit dystopia filled with cybernetic enhancements and rogue AI. Hack systems, complete missions, and navigate the moral grey of a futuristic city.
shortDescription: Neon cyberpunk adventure with hacking and missions.

title: Mystic Legends
longDescription: An epic fantasy RPG where magic, mythical creatures, and legendary quests await. Build your hero, forge alliances, and change the fate of the realm.
shortDescription: Fantasy RPG with magic, creatures, and epic quests.

title: Rogue Skies
longDescription: Rogue Skies is an aerial combat simulator where you pilot high-tech aircraft in intense dogfights. Customize planes, join squadrons, and dominate the skies.
shortDescription: High-speed aerial combat with plane customization.

title: Zombie Outbreak X
longDescription: Survive a global zombie apocalypse by scavenging, crafting, and fighting hordes of undead. Team up with survivors or go solo in this high-stakes survival game.
shortDescription: Zombie survival game with crafting and combat.

title: Star Voyager: Beyond
longDescription: Explore distant galaxies, colonize planets, and engage in space battles. Star Voyager: Beyond combines strategy, exploration, and real-time combat in a massive universe.
shortDescription: Space exploration and strategy with epic battles.

title: Ancient Warriors
longDescription: Ancient Warriors is a historical action game where you fight epic battles, master ancient weapons, and lead armies in historically inspired campaigns.
shortDescription: Historical action game with epic battles and weapons.
